definition: Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: yus hru'u bod rigs rang skyong khul) in Qinghai
Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: yus hru'u bod rigs rang skyong khul) in Qinghai
Yushu county (Tibetan: yus hru'u rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: yus hru'u bod rigs rang skyong khul) in Qinghai
pinyin: Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: lit. orchids and jade trees (idiom); fig. a child with splendid future prospects

sentences.english: The great will of combating the Yushu earthquake continuously inspired me.
sentences.chinese: 與玉樹地震鬥爭的堅強意志不斷地激勵着我。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of Herba Swertiae Mussotll liver injury in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究玉樹獐牙菜對小鼠實驗性肝損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: China is holding a national day of mourning for victims of the powerful earthquake in Qinghai province.
sentences.chinese: 中國爲青海玉樹地震傷亡者舉行全國哀悼日。

sentences.english: Yushu have many the miracle of life, a lot of people with you.
sentences.chinese: 玉樹有很多生命的古蹟，很多讓人敬佩的人與事。

sentences.english: These trees are evergreen and are beautiful objects at all seasons of the year.
sentences.chinese: 這些樹四季常青，有如玉樹臨風。

sentences.english: I suddenly thought of the people in Yushu, who are going through the threat of strong earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 我突然想起了玉樹人民，他們正在經受強地震的威脅。

sentences.english: A poem lovely as a tree.
Mongolia will invite 60 students from the quake-hit area in Qinghai to recuperate in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 蒙方邀請60名青海玉樹地震災區學生來蒙休養。

sentences.english: "They left Qamdo in the morning and will arrive at Yushu in the afternoon," he said.
sentences.chinese: 他們於早晨離開昌都，將於下午抵達玉樹。

sentences.english: Yushu lies at the great mountains, against a gentle hill side.
sentences.chinese: 玉樹位於大山之間，偎依着一個大山的緩坡。

sentences.english: We decided to release the information on the Yushu Earthquake first.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定先公佈玉樹地震災區捐贈信息。

sentences.english: Tibetan residents of Jiegu, Yushu County, in northwest China's Qinghai province have a meal outside their makeshift tents amid the rubble of demolished homes on April 15.
sentences.chinese: 玉樹結古鎮的藏民們在臨時搭建的帳篷外就餐。

sentences.english: National flag-raising ceremony held in Yushu .
sentences.chinese: 玉樹舉行迎國慶升旗儀式。

sentences.english: Steward was indeed tall and handsome, with a narrow waist and gray sideburns .
sentences.chinese: 史都華確實是玉樹臨風，沈腰潘鬢。

sentences.english: Father was a policeman, 38-year-old, jade tree.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是一名警察，今年38歲了，玉樹臨風。

definition: (literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
fabled island in Eastern sea, abode of immortals/same as Penglai 蓬萊|蓬莱
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
(literary) crisscross/uneven/disorderly/rim of the eye/variant of 欄杆|栏杆[lan2 gan1]
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
